name: Aegis of the Immortal
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

descriptions.name: Reincarnation
descriptions.description: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
